title: Social Media Research
description: Scrape, analyze, and monitor social media content

createJobDialog.title: Create Scraping Job
createJobDialog.description: Configure a new social media scraping task

addProfileDialog.title: Add Social Media Profile
addProfileDialog.description: Add a profile to track and analyze

profiles.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this profile?

empty.title: No profiles yet
empty.description: Add social media profiles to start tracking and analyzing content

empty.title: No posts scraped yet
empty.description: Create a scraping job to collect posts from this profile

selectProfile.title: Select a profile
selectProfile.description: Choose a profile from the Profiles tab to view its posts

empty.title: No scraping jobs yet
empty.description: Create a job to start scraping social media content

tools.title: Integration Tools & Setup
tools.description: External tools required for social media scraping

instagram.title: Instagram - Instaloader
instagram.description: Download photos, videos, captions, and metadata from Instagram

youtube.title: YouTube - yt-dlp
youtube.description: Download videos, metadata, and subtitles from YouTube and 1000+ sites

twitter.title: Twitter/X - snscrape or twint
twitter.description: Scrape tweets, profiles, and trends without API limits

tiktok.title: TikTok - TikTok-Api or tiktok-scraper
tiktok.description: Download TikTok videos and user profiles

notes.title: Important Notes
items: These tools run locally or on your own servers
Respect platform terms of service and rate limits
Data can be uploaded to this platform via the API

workflow.title: Integration Workflow
items: Install the appropriate scraping tool locally
Run the tool to collect social media data
Process and format the data (JSON recommended)
Upload to this platform via the API endpoints
Analyze and visualize the collected data
